Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Only worthy emperors can see the cloak.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Dunk Tank
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Deal $4 damage. Corrupt: Then deal $2 damage to all enemy minions.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: "When I said bring a tank to the dungeon, this is not what I had in mind!"

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Fantastic Firebird
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Windfury
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: The original flaming chicken.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Felsaber
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Can only attack if your hero attacked this turn.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Some drivers rev their engines. This one growls all on its own.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Fire Breather
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to all minions except Demons.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: "Phew! That skull has been stuck between my teeth for hours!"

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Hysteria
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text:
[x]Choose an enemy minion.
It attacks random
minions until it dies.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: "My mount and I share a special connection. Just not a good one."

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Il'gynoth
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Lifesteal Your Lifesteal damages the enemy hero instead of healing you.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Well, that just sounds like damage with extra steps.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Knife Vendor
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Battlecry: Deal 4 damage to each hero.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: "They're perfectly safe! These gloves totally aren't hiding any bandages."

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Lightsteed
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text:
Your healing effects also give affected minions
+2_Health.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: All the steed, half the calories.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Occult Conjurer
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Battlecry: If you control a Secret, summon a copy of_this.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Like mirror image, but more secretive and angsty.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Rally!
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text:
Resurrect a friendly
1-Cost, 2-Cost, and
3-Cost minion.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: One for the squire, two for the gnome, three for the glory, and GO, GO, GO!

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Renowned Performer
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Rush Deathrattle: Summon two __1/1 Assistants with Taunt.__
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Cutting the assistant in half is the easy part.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Ring Toss
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Discover a Secret and cast it. Corrupt: Discover 2 instead.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: If you liked it, then you shoulda put a ring on it!

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Rinling's Rifle
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: After your hero attacks, Discover a Secret and cast it.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: This rifle needs a muzzle for its muzzle.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Sword Eater
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Taunt Battlecry: Equip a 3/2_Sword.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: How tough is he? He eats swords for breakfast! Without any milk.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: The Nameless One
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Battlecry: Choose a minion. Become a 4/4 copy of it, then Silence it.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Used to be called "             , the Nameless," but everyone got confused.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Arbor Up
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Summon two 2/2 Treants. Give your minions +2/+1.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: If you can’t outrun a tree, you really shouldn’t be here anyway.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Carousel Gryphon
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Divine Shield Corrupt: Gain +3/+3 and_Taunt.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: "When does this bird land in Stormwind? I've been flying for hours!"

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Dark Inquisitor Xanesh
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Battlecry: Reduce the Cost of all Corrupt and Corrupted cards in your hand and deck by (2).
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Fear is the mind-killer, and also the name of my wurm.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Deck of Chaos
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Swap the Cost and Attack of all minions in_your deck.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Yeah, it's chaos, but it's organized chaos.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Derailed Coaster
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Battlecry: Summon a 1/1 Rider with Rush for each minion in your hand.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: So long as it doesn’t kill you, it's considered part of the ride "experience."

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Envoy Rustwix
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Deathrattle: Shuffle 3 random Prime Legendary minions into your deck.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: "Time to roll. Rusted Legion, ho!"

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Firework Elemental
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to a minion. Corrupt: Deal 12 instead.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: The brightest spark can still go dark.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Fleethoof Pearltusk
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Rush Corrupt: Gain +4/+4.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Guest interactions may vary over the duration of the visit.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Fortune Teller
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Gain +1/+1 for each spell in your hand.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: "I see a giant piano in your future."

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Greybough
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Give a random friendly minion "Deathrattle: Summon Greybough."
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The next best time is when you lose a minion.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Inara Stormcrash
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: On your turn, your hero has +2 Attack and Windfury.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: A fan favorite, Inara is always met with thunderous applause.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Keywarden Ivory
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Battlecry: Discover a Dual Class spell from any class. Spellburst: Get another copy.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: She learned exactly one thing from her old man: copying.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Lothraxion the Redeemed
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Battlecry: For the rest of the game, after you summon a Silver Hand Recruit, give it Divine Shield.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: So infused with the Light, he has to wear double sleep masks at night.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Malevolent Strike
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text:
[x]Destroy a minion.
 Costs (1) less for each
_ card in your deck that
_ didn't start there.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: "I don't know how those got in there, but I'm blaming you two."

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Mistrunner
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Battlecry: Give a friendly minion +3/+3. Overload: (1)
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: "Get IT off me!!!"

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Moonfang
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Can only take 1 damage at_a time.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Moonforehead just didn't have the same ring to it.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Optimistic Ogre
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: 50% chance to attack the correct enemy.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: "What if this goes wrong?" "But what if this goes right?"

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Ringmaster Whatley
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Battlecry: Draw a Mech, Dragon, and Pirate.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: His main qualification is that he'll work with anyone. Or anything.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Tent Trasher
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Rush. Costs (1) less for each friendly minion with a unique minion type.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: "I consider it redecorating."

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Trampling Rhino
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Rush. After this attacks and kills a minion, excess damage hits the enemy hero.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: "Whew. I thought you said 'Trampoline Rhino.' Now that would have been scary."

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Zai, the Incredible
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Battlecry: Copy the left- and right-most cards in your hand.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Following this act will be her younger brother, Frank the Mediocre.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Bladed Lady
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Rush Costs (1) if your hero has 6 or more Attack.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: While you were busy learning magic, she studied the blade.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Claw Machine
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Rush. Deathrattle: Draw a minion and give it +3/+3.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: "I have been mrglrlglr… chosen!"

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Grand Empress Shek'zara
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Battlecry: Discover a card in your deck and draw all copies of it.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: So is a Grand Empress an empress that's grand or an empress's empress?

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Hammer of the Naaru
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Battlecry: Summon a 6/6 Holy Elemental with Taunt.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: The naaru wasn't using it. It doesn't have arms.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Maxima Blastenheimer
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Battlecry: Summon a minion from your deck. It attacks the enemy hero, then dies.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Believe it or not, this is only the faire's fourth most dangerous game.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Ring Matron
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Taunt Deathrattle: Summon two 3/2 Imps.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: But where does she keep them?

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Sayge, Seer of Darkmoon
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Battlecry: Draw @ |4(card, cards). (Upgraded for each friendly Secret that has triggered this game!)
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: There are no secrets between us... or refunds.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Tickatus
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Battlecry: Remove the top 5 cards from your deck. Corrupt: Your opponent's deck instead.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: "These are all.... EXPIRED!"

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Darkmoon Tonk
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Deathrattle: Fire four missiles at random enemies that deal 2 damage each.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: "Ready to roll out!"

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Expendable Performers
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Summon seven 1/1 Illidari with Rush. If_they all die this turn, summon seven more.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: When someone gets injured, it's considered performance art.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Libram of Judgment
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Corrupt: Gain Lifesteal.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: You really can't judge a book by its cover.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Mask of C'Thun
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Deal $10 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Hide in the mask, but it will wear you. Through its gleaming eye, you shall see true.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Silas Darkmoon
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Battlecry: Choose a direction to rotate all minions.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: "You might remember me from such attractions as 'Being Shot out of a Cannon' or 'That Carousel Ate My Friend.'"

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Strongman
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Taunt Corrupt: This costs (0).
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Sure, it looks impressive until you realize it's a barrel of helium.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Umbral Owl
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Rush Costs (1) less for each spell you've cast this game.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: It sleeps with one eye open.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Cenarion Ward
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text:
Gain 8 Armor.
Summon a random
8-Cost minion.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Don't ask about his right hand. He's still growing into it.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: G'huun the Blood God
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Battlecry: Draw 2 cards. They cost Health instead of Mana.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: All of the other Old Gods used to laugh and call him names. They never let poor G'huun join in any Old God games.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Grand Finale
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Summon an 8/8 Elemental. Repeat for each Elemental you played last turn.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Considering all the other hazards at Darkmoon, overindulgent pyrotechnics seem downright pedestrian.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: High Exarch Yrel
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has no Neutral cards, gain Rush, Lifesteal, Taunt, and Divine Shield.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: There can be no neutrality in the fight against darkness.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Idol of Y'Shaarj
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Summon a 10/10 copy_of a minion in your deck.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Without a tongue, it speaks in seven. Without a voice, its echo lingers forever.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Jewel of N'Zoth
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Summon three friendly Deathrattle minions that died this game.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: This coveted gem calls for you to free it… and unleash an inescapable prison.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Blood of G'huun
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Taunt At the end of your turn, summon a 5/5 copy of a minion in your deck.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: An attempted cure becomes disease, blooming and thriving as rot and decay.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Carnival Clown
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Taunt Battlecry: Summon 2 copies of this. Corrupt: Fill your board with copies.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Send in the clowns!

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Fizzy Elemental
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Rush Taunt
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Loved. Hated. Carbonated.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: N'Zoth, God of the Deep
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Battlecry: Resurrect a friendly minion of each minion type.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: It really just wants to cuddle all the creatures of Azeroth.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Runaway Blackwing
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text:
[x]At the end of your turn,
deal 9 damage to a
random enemy minion.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: It has been 5 minutes since our last Azeroth Racing League violation.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: C'Thun, the Shattered
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Start of Game: Break into pieces. Battlecry: Deal 30 damage randomly split among all enemies.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: My grandfather's deck has no useless cards!

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Darkmoon Rabbit
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: Rush, Poisonous Also damages the minions next to whomever this attacks.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: That's no ordinary rabbit! That's the most foul, cruel, and bad-tempered rodent you ever set eyes on!

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Y'Shaarj, the Defiler
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Battlecry: Add a copy of each Corrupted card you've played this game to your hand. They cost (0) this turn.
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Y'Shaarj made an excellent office intern, doing the copying AND defiling.

Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.name: Yogg-Saron, Master of Fate
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.text: [x]Battlecry: If you've cast 10 spells this game, spin the Wheel of Yogg-Saron.@ ({0} left!)@ (Ready!)
Madness At The Darkmoon Faire.flavor: Yogg take the wheel!
